layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x72
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x72
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x40
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x40
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 783x39
          text run at (0,0) width 783: "Any textual selection in this long paragraph should have green background. Any textual selection in this long paragraph should have"
          text run at (0,20) width 565: "green background. Any textual selection in this long paragraph should have green background."
